title: San and Sans Serif
content:
Anyone have any good suggestions for font families that have Sans and Serif styles. I’m a big fan of Apex over at [www.vllg.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117044337/http:/www.vllg.com/ "www.vllg.com"), but I’m look for others that don’t have descenders with the numbers.
